marklogic.body: This is great! Our road has been similar. Kili was in 2008. Gave me the climbing Itch, so did Mt Kenya in 2011. Then Elbrus was on my radar. The ultimate goal being Everest. But I was told Delnali would be a much better prep for Everest than Elbrus, so that's where my focus is. I was born in 1968 and have has hip and elbow surgeries, and due for another hip surgery, so I'm also trying to get my money's worth! Lol. Cheers and all the best, Lori Losch
